meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: LEAD: New Look at Agent Orange A Federal judge ordered the Veterans Administration to reconsider its policy of denying most Vietnam veterans' claims of harm from Agent Orange. Page A24. Censorship Confirmed The White House said it had censored a Government scientist's testimony on global warming, as Britain called for international action on the problem.

LEAD: New Look at Agent Orange A Federal judge ordered the Veterans Administration to reconsider its policy of denying most Vietnam veterans' claims of harm from Agent Orange. Page A24. Censorship Confirmed The White House said it had censored a Government scientist's testimony on global warming, as Britain called for international action on the problem.

New Look at Agent Orange A Federal judge ordered the Veterans Administration to reconsider its policy of denying most Vietnam veterans' claims of harm from Agent Orange. Page A24. Censorship Confirmed The White House said it had censored a Government scientist's testimony on global warming, as Britain called for international action on the problem. Science Times, page C1. Japan and Lost U.S. H-Bomb A hydrogen bomb, lost off an aircraft carrier in 1965, is on the ocean floor 80 miles from a Japanese island, and Japanese are angry. Page A3.
